repos_data.description: A lightweight client for managing MariaDB, MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Interbase and Firebird, written in Delphi and Lazarus/FreePascal
A fast, portable, simple, and free C/C++ IDE
A curated list of awesome Delphi/FreePascal/(any)Pascal frameworks, libraries, resources, and shiny things. Inspired by awesome-... stuff. Open source and freeware only!
